attributes.action: stop scottish mp's voting on english only matters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as a proud englishman i am fed up of seeing in the papers and on the news about how scottish voters are getting things like university education for free also certain drugs,care home residents getting full free care. and then some minister coming out and saying "well the scottish parliament has voted for it" exactly the point, so why as scottish mp's sitting in westminister are they allowed to vote on the same matters that only effect english citizens. we, who voice these concerns are labelled as Union wreckers, why, we only want to be on a level playing field. we want democracy. it is the labour party that caused this imbalence.
NO SCOTTISH MP SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO VOTE ON ENGLISH ONLY MATTERS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
